sense.name: express disapproval of somebody or something
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 CRITICIZE (NP2) Note: If transitive, CRITICIZE appears often in passive form.
sense.examples: We'll get nowhere if all you can do is criticize. The government is being widely criticized for failing to limit air pollution.

sense.name: give considered opinion on something
sense.examples: We're a group of artists who meet to discuss things and criticize each other's work.
